text: This chapter may be cited as the "Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act of 2010".
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-1101 has been recodified as § 29A-1101.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 1 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act) . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-1101

Current through December 11, 2012
